title: 229 of 2018) are amended, in Regulation 21(1), by the substitution of “for not
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Insurance
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Insurance 

Distribution) (Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 9 October 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (insurance distribution) (amendment) regulation 2024 (2) regulation shall come operation 9 october 2024

title: 229 of 2018) are amended, in Regulation 21(1), by the substitution of “for not
heading: 2. The European Union (Insurance Distribution) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No.
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Insurance Distribution) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 
229 of 2018) are amended, in Regulation 21(1), by the substitution of “for not 
less than €1,564,610 applying to each claim and in aggregate €2,315,610 per 
year for all claims” for “for not less than €1,300,380 applying to each claim and 
in aggregate €1,924,560 per year for all claims”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 September, 2024. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ No. L 26, 2.2.2016, p. 19 
2 OJ L, 2024/896, 20.3.2024 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [466] 3
